body_html:
This is definitely confusing and was a headache to solve since I was getting an Incompatible Shape error consistently near step 1000 of training. Its worst since there is few documentation.

I would suggest adding a kwarg like drop_remainder = False to the batch method that implements the solution suggested by @mrry.
body_text:
This is definitely confusing and was a headache to solve since I was getting an Incompatible Shape error consistently near step 1000 of training. Its worst since there is few documentation.
I would suggest adding a kwarg like drop_remainder = False to the batch method that implements the solution suggested by @mrry.
body:
This is definitely confusing and was a headache to solve since I was getting an `Incompatible Shape` error consistently near step 1000 of training. Its worst since there is few documentation. 

I would suggest adding a kwarg like `drop_remainder = False` to the `batch` method that implements the solution suggested by @mrry.
